title: Togainu no Chi Volume 2
description: In the dark world of the Igura, only one figure strikes terror into the souls of the men who risk their lives for fame and glory. His name is Shiki and death awaits those who meet his blade. Can Akira fight off the mysterious swordsman and win back his own freedom? Or will he be saved by an unlikely friend?
author: Suguro Chayamachi
